title: A Second Treasury of the World's Greatest Fairy Tales
description: These are a compilation of classic fairy tales with beautiful CinderellaSnow White and the Seven DwarfsAladdin and the Magic LampSleeping BeautyLittle Red RidinghoodThe Lion and the CarpenterBeauty and the BeastThe Seven RavensThe Little GoldfishThe Little Tin SoldierThe Emperor's NightingaleThumbelinaThe Three Hairs of the OgreThe Pied Piper
author: Helen Hyman
